description: Chalazion is a small, painless lump or swelling in the eyelid that is caused by a blocked oil gland.
possible causes: Blockage of oil glands in the eyelid
symptoms: Blurry vision if the chalazion is large
treatments: Warm compress to help reduce swelling
Eyelid massage to help unclog the blocked gland
Antibiotic ointment if there is an infection
